# Assembler

## Test Example

(Input File: "assembly_code.txt")
```
MOVI r0 rx #15
MOVI r1 rx #15
MOVI r2 rx #15
MOVI r3 rx #10
SHLI r0 r0 #12
SHLI r1 r1 #12
LSRI r1 r1 #4
SHLI r2 r2 #12
LSRI r2 r2 #8
SHLI r3 r3 #12
LSRI r3 r3 #12
OR r4 r0 r1
OR r4 r4 r2
OR r4 r4 r3
MOVI r0 rx #9
MOVI r1 rx #10
MOVI r2 rx #11
MOVI r3 rx #12
SHLI r0 r0 #12
SHLI r1 r1 #12
LSRI r1 r1 #4
SHLI r2 r2 #12
LSRI r2 r2 #8
SHLI r3 r3 #12
LSRI r3 r3 #12
OR r5 r0 r1
OR r5 r5 r2
OR r5 r5 r3
NOT r0 rx r4
NOT r1 rx r5
AND r6 r4 r1
AND r7 r0 r5
OR r0 r6 r7

```

Convert the following assembly source to machine code
(Output File: "machine_code.txt")

```
00011000 00001111
00011000 10001111
00011001 00001111
00011001 10001010
00111000 00001100
00111000 10011100
01011000 10010100
00111001 00101100
01011001 00101000
00111001 10111100
01011001 10111100
10010010 00000010
10010010 01000100
10010010 01000110
00011000 00001001
00011000 10001010
00011001 00001011
00011001 10001100
00111000 00001100
00111000 10011100
01011000 10010100
00111001 00101100
01011001 00101000
00111001 10111100
01011001 10111100
10010010 10000010
10010010 11010100
10010010 11010110
10110000 00001000
10110000 10001010
10000011 01000010
10000011 10001010
10010000 01101110
```
